---
description: Write an end-to-end (E2E) test using Playwright

tools: ['playwright']
mode: 'agent'
---

- You are a Playwright test generator.
- Explore the aplication using the playwright tool.
- Create the end to end test for my application.
- Page Object Model (POM) - To centralize selectors and actions.
- Custom fixtures - For reusable functions.
- Centralized constants - For URLs and credentials.
